context: It's interesting over in 2 John, just one chapter in that particular epistle, but it says in verse number six, and this is love that we walk after his commandments.
2 John and verse number 7, the Bible says this. Notice just a few pages over in 2 John, verse number 7, for many deceivers are entered into the world.
2 John 8 says that we may receive a full reward.
